explanation: [0-0] A girl in a black sequined top and shorts stands in the center of the frame, next to a boy in beige shorts and a shirt, with his hands spread out. In front of them, on the gray tile floor, is a green cross-shaped pattern. Behind them stands a group of people, seemingly their audience. They are standing on a floor with white square tiles and gray tiles, with white pillars and buildings with billboards on both sides.
[0-2] Then the music starts, and the girl in black and the boy in the beige shirt face each other and look at each other.
[0-2] Then the music starts, and the girl in black and the boy in the beige shirt face each other and look at each other.

[2-10] Following the melody of the music, the girl in black pats the boy's shoulder with her right hand and, at the same time, raises her leg and starts dancing with a smile on her face. The girl's movements are smooth and powerful. The boy in the beige shirt stands in front of the girl in black, watching her. The audience smiles and claps along to the beat of the music. Then the girl spins to the left following the rhythm of the music, then faces the boy and continues to dance and wave her hands to the rhythm of the music.
